name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircularClosedGaugeImage
desc: A template for displaying a full-color circular image and a closed circular gauge.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, imageProvider: CLKFullColorImageProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template with a closed circular gauge, and an image in the center.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.
